name: JavaScript Mod Player
body:
### Welcome to JavaScript Mod Player.
  As the name indicates, this is a player of mod format music. Please try out our [demo](http://chenzeyu.github.com/JavaScript-Mod-Player/demo/demo.html)!


### User Guide
  * You can choose to play your own mod files on your own computer, or choose to play the several demos we provided.
  * Please do not click another song to play while one is playing. 
  * No playback control provided, you can refresh the page to stop the song.


### Limitations
  * Only several effects are implemented.
  * Consume a lot of system resources.
  * No playback control provided.
  * Implemented by using web audio api, therefore IE is not supported.

### Authors
  * [Chen Zeyu](https://github.com/chenzeyu) ([zeyufly@gmail.com](mailto:zeyufly@gmail.com))
  * [Qing Cheng](https://github.com/qingchengnus) ([qingchengnus@gmail.com](mailto:qingchengnus@gmail.com))

### Acknowledgement
  * PeriodTable and ChannelNumTable are based on the [project jsmodplayer](https://github.com/gasman/jsmodplayer/) by gasman.

### Supervisors
  * Assoc. Prof. Martin Henz (National University of Singapore)
  * Mr. Srikumar K. S. (National University of Sinagpore)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
